message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price of $14,000. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you, considering the value you see in it. Please let me know if this meets your expectations.

Alice, thank you for the offer, but $14,000 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for the product.  This is a fair price considering my maximum budget and the value I place on your product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet somewhere in the middle. In light of this, I would like to offer you the product for $13,000. This is a price that reflects both the value of the product and your budget considerations. I hope this proposal works for you.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my range.  Let's split the difference - I'll offer you $12,750. This is a fair price that's close to both of our positions.
